query: WITH entities AS (SELECT customer_id, collateralization_ratio, id FROM credit_facilities WHERE ((customer_id = $1) AND ((collateralization_ratio IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $4) AND COALESCE(id > $3, true) OR COALESCE(collateralization_ratio > $4, collateralization_ratio IS NOT NULL))) ORDER BY collateralization_ratio ASC NULLS FIRST, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CreditFacilityId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.collateralization_ratio asc nulls first, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
